<[[http://www.perrier-jouet.com/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thank you for your presence at the Perrier Jouët Belle Epoque 2007 'Small Discoveries' by mischer'traxler Official Launch. As a gesture of appreciation, we are delighted to present you with the opportunity to add the exclusive Perrier Jouët Belle Epoque 2007 'Small Discoveries' by mischer'traxler to your collection - a privilege reserved for a select group of connoisseurs who share a passion for fine champagne. BELLE EPOQUE 2007 MISCHER'TRAXLER LIMITED EDITION The collectible limited edition is a joint creation by Cellar Master Hervé Deschamps and the mischer'traxler design duo. The poetic decoration of this masterpiece conjures up the silence of the cellars to reveal its crystalline lightness, generosity and refinement of the vintage.
DISCOVER THE ENTIRE BELLE EPOQUE COLLECTION For an unforgettably indulgent champagne experience, enjoy the Belle Epoque collection at The Black Swan – the perfect venue for raising a glass to celebrate in style. CONTACT US <[[mailto:SGsales@pernod-ricard.com?subject=Add Belle Epoque 2007 Mischer]]> ABOUT BELLE EPOQUE <[[http://www.perrier-jouet.com/]]> You have previously provided Pernod Ricard with your personal data to be used in accordance with our Privacy Policy <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_Perrier-Jouet-Generic-Registration_Page---Privacy-Policy.html]]>.
